synopsis.text: The characters from the popular online game "The World" receive a cryptic invitation from their former leader Ovan, asking them to meet him at the Hidden Forbidden Festival. This mysterious summer festival setup sparks intrigue and confusion. Upon arriving, the group discovers not Ovan but a strange creature named Chim Chim. Surprisingly, this AIDA wishes to peacefully coexist with the players. However, it soon transforms into the word "Returner," suggesting Ovan himself plans to return to The World. Though Ovan remains absent, his invitation sets off a chain of puzzling and dangerous events. After opening a chest, the team unwittingly releases a monster they must quickly subdue. They puzzle over its nature and Ovan's motives for leading them there. Yet intrigue lingers over the meaning of the creature's message - does their former leader truly plan a long-awaited return? Only by pressing forward can the team unravel the secrets of the Hidden Forbidden Festival.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
